message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $9,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand your position, Bob, but $8,500 is a bit too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,750?
